title: 怎么设置世界死亡不掉落
txt_content:
1.7.10
我想设置死亡不掉落
末地和暮色的
模组服
求教不懂

replies.author: Worf丶Horo
replies.txt_content:
/gamerule doKeepInventory true
不过要每个世界都设置一遍。

replies.author: 翎澈Official
replies.txt_content: 到末地和暮色森林（末地是DIM1，暮色是DIM7），然后每个世界都输一遍/gamerule keepInventory true就行了

replies.author: 世予予
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: Worf丶Horo
replies.txt_content:
插件的话建议这个。https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-884881-1-1.html
与gamerule一个原理，只是自动设定了

Worf丶Horo 发表于 2020-2-18 21:56
插件的话建议这个。https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-884881-1-1.html
与gamerule一个原理，只是自动设定了 ...
我打/gamerule doKeepInventory true显示
No game rule called doKeepInventory is available
什么意思

replies.author: 北辰N6
replies.txt_content:
去暮色世界输入
/gamerule keepInventory true
这指令就可以了！

replies.author: qq1440357514
replies.txt_content: 指令/gamerule keepInventory true控制该世界死亡不掉落

replies.author: o0海绵0o
replies.txt_content: /gamerule keepInventory true我记得打这个就可以了把

replies.author: zaizai21
replies.txt_content: 你先到末地和暮色，然后输入/gamerule keepInventory true，就可以了

replies.author: 1147127977zxc
replies.txt_content: 在想要不掉落的世界里输入/gamerule keepInventory true

在你当前的世界输入：/gamerule keepInventory true 就可以不掉落了。
或者你可以尝试插件：https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php? ... 126&ordertype=1
https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-884881-1-1.html

replies.author: 名副其实
replies.txt_content:
1060068085 发表于 2020-2-18 22:49
我打/gamerule doKeepInventory true显示
No game rule called doKeepInventory is available
什么意思 ...
此规则大小写敏感。
若你想要输入正确参数请按TAB补全
